{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3117322,"name":"Marlow T","username":"sktracy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sktracy/{size}/179895_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-06T20:00:17.582Z","cooked":"

Happy almost kickoff!

Team 4096 is proud to release the CAD design for our 2022 robot, ChaoZ:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/14GEJSmFAvSbv2VVpFv4hGAY8sXwmkglx?usp=share_link

Additionally, here is the CAD from our 2020-2021 robot, KronoZ:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1rQJnURlQ0ruVthJXnphwvgdeKi-xLwAH?usp=share_link

Please let us know if you have any questions!
